Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.han.ica.oopg.objects.GameObject
      • nl.han.ica.oopg.objects.SpriteObject
        • nl.han.ica.oopg.objects.AnimatedSpriteObject
          • enemy.Enemy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    nl.han.ica.oopg.collision.ICollidableWithTiles, nl.han.ica.oopg.userinput.IKeyInput, nl.han.ica.oopg.userinput.IMouseInput, processing.core.PConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CircularSaw, Zombie
    public abstract class Enemy
extends nl.han.ica.oopg.objects.AnimatedSpriteObject
implements nl.han.ica.oopg.collision.ICollidableWithTiles
    Class that contains all basic structure of the two enemies: CircularSaw and Zombie Makes sure sub-classes set damage and stay out of the walls

      • getAdjacentTile

        protected nl.han.ica.oopg.tile.Tile getAdjacentTile​(nl.han.ica.oopg.tile.Tile tile,
                                                    float heading,
                                                    float side)
        This gets a tile adjacent to the given tile, to a specified side, relative to our movement direction.
        Parameters:
        tile - The tile this saw is on.
        heading - The direction (in degrees) the saw is moving in.
        side - The direction (in degrees) of the tile to return, relative to your heading. (-90 for left, 90 for right)
        Returns:
        The adjacent tile specified.
